title: PickleChamps
description: The best pickleballers in all of the universe compete in an intergalactic championship for the title of the ultimate big dill

title: DeathBots
description: The most intense matchup of man versus machine- your favorite MMA fighters head to head with lean mean carbon steel machines

title: Cooper's Hill Cheese- Rolling and Wake
description: Participants race down the 200-yard long hill chasing a wheel of Double Gloucester cheese.
